name: world
content: JSON-encoded dictionary with these key-value pairs - 'tick': integer, 'entities': dictionary with keys that are strings and values that are dictionaries with key-value pairs 'entity': string and 'position': (integer, integer), and 'movements': list of movements (see movement.json)
meaning: Current state of the game world, with tick number, list of movements, and a list of entity positions, with the keys in the 'entities' entry being names of the form entity-name_index and the values in the 'entities' entry containing entity names and positions (given as (x,y) co-ordinates)
